accountPage.pageDescription: Manage your account information, security, and preferences.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: Please sign in to access account settings.

messages.passwordLength: New password must be at least 8 characters long
messages.passwordException: An error occurred while changing password
messages.avatarRegenerateException: An error occurred while regenerating avatar
messages.deleteException: An error occurred while deleting account
messages.syncLoading: Settings are still loading. Please wait a moment.
messages.syncEnabled: Settings sync enabled. Your settings will now be synced across devices.
messages.syncDisabled: Settings sync disabled. Your settings are now stored locally only.
messages.syncException: An error occurred while toggling settings sync
messages.sessionOutdated: Your session is outdated. Please sign out and sign in again to continue.

profilePicture.title: Profile Picture
profilePicture.alternativeDescription: Don't have a photo? You can use a generated avatar instead.

nameSection.title: Display Name
nameSection.label: Name
nameSection.description: This is the name that will be displayed publicly on your profile.

usernameSection.title: Username
usernameSection.label: Username
usernameSection.description: Your unique username will be displayed as @{username} under your name.

syncSection.title: Settings Sync
syncSection.description: Enable settings sync to keep your search preferences, AI options, theme, and other settings synchronized across all your devices.
syncSection.statusEnabled: Your settings are synced across devices
syncSection.syncedList: Synced settings include: Search engine preferences, AI model choices, weather settings, theme, autocomplete provider, search regions, and SafeSearch settings.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.confirmPrompt: Please type "{phrase}" to confirm account deletion:

privacyPage.pageDescription: Review what we store and manage your search preferences export/import.

messages.importInvalidKind: Invalid file format: expected tekir.settings file
messages.importInvalidPreferences: Invalid file format: missing or invalid preferences

serverOverview.title: Your Data on Tekir Servers
serverOverview.signInPrompt: Sign in to view your server-stored data overview.
serverOverview.privacyNote: We store only what’s needed to provide your experience. No analytics, no tracking. Account details aren’t included in export/import; only search preferences are. Your privacy is our priority.

transfer.title: Export / Import Preferences

export.title: Export
export.description: Download your current search preferences as {file}.

import.title: Import
import.description: Import preferences from a {file} file. This won’t change your account details.

transfer.hint: Supported file: {file} (kind: tekir.settings, version: 1). Only search preferences are applied.

searchPage.pageDescription: Customize your search experience and AI preferences.

aiFeatures.title: AI Features
aiFeatures.description: Configure AI-powered search and response features.
aiFeatures.karakulakDescription: Enable AI-powered responses for your search queries
aiFeatures.modelDescription: Select your preferred AI model for responses

llama.name: Llama 4
llama.description: A powerful and open-source model by Meta

gemini.name: Gemini 2.5
gemini.description: A fast and intelligent model by Google

claude.name: Claude 4.5
claude.description: Latest and fastest model from Anthropic

mistral.name: Mistral Mini
mistral.description: A lightweight model by Mistral AI

uiLanguage.title: UI & Language
uiLanguage.description: Customize your interface and language preferences.
uiLanguage.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface

externalServices.title: External Services
externalServices.clim8Description: Enable weather data from Clim8 based on your IP location
externalServices.customWeatherDescription: Set a preferred location for weather reports instead of using your IP location
externalServices.weatherUnitsDescription: Choose between metric (°C, km/h) or imperial (°F, mph) units
externalServices.weatherPlacementDescription: Choose where to show the Clim8 widget on the homepage

hero.label: Under search bar
hero.description: Show weather chip beneath the main search box

topRight.label: Next to profile
topRight.description: Show under the welcome text near your avatar

searchOptions.title: Search Options
searchOptions.description: Configure your search provider and filtering preferences.
searchOptions.enchantedDescription: Toggle News and Videos widgets in search results
searchOptions.wikipediaDescription: Show Wikipedia summaries and information in search results
searchOptions.faviconsDescription: Show site icons next to result links
searchOptions.recommendationsDescription: Show daily recommended searches under the search bar on the homepage
searchOptions.searchProviderDescription: Choose your search engine for web results

brave.label: Brave
brave.description: Privacy-focused results with video and news options

you.label: You.com
you.description: Search engine optimized for AI-assisted results

google.label: Google
google.description: The most popular and accurate search engine worldwide

searchOptions.searchRegionDescription: Choose your preferred search region for localized results
searchOptions.safeSearchDescription: Filter explicit content from your search results

cache.title: Cache
cache.description: Tekir saves some data in your device's cache to serve faster responses. You can clear it anytime.
cache.clearDescription: Removes cached search, images, news, videos, AI, Dive, Wikipedia, and autocomplete entries stored locally.

syncStatus.synced: Settings are automatically saved and synced across devices.
syncStatus.localOnly: Settings are automatically saved to your local storage.

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

userMenu.usageTooltip: This is the amount of requests you have remaining for the day. A search typically costs around 6 requests.

footer.tagline: Tekir is a privacy-friendly search engine that serves the best search experience.

heading.title: The Search Engine That Respects You
heading.subtitleLine1: Discover why others choose Tekir for their daily searches.
heading.subtitleLine2: Privacy-focused, lightning-fast, and packed with intelligent features.

privacy.title: Privacy by Design
privacy.description: No tracking, no data collection, no profile building. Your searches remain completely private and are never stored or shared with third parties.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Get results in milliseconds with our optimized search infrastructure. Never wait around for answers.

aiChat.title: AI-Powered Chat
aiChat.description1: Get instant answers with our integrated AI chat powered by advanced language models.
aiChat.description2: Experience seamless conversations and get the information you need, when you need it. Use our AI chat to dive deeper into topics and ask follow-up questions.

bangs.title: Bang Commands
bangs.description: Search directly on your favorite sites with bang commands. Type !g for Google, !w for Wikipedia, and hundreds more.

autocomplete.title: Smart Autocomplete
autocomplete.description: Intelligent suggestions that learn from global search patterns while keeping your data private.

weather.title: Weather at a Glance
weather.description: Get current weather conditions right on your search homepage.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Transparent, auditable code that you can inspect and contribute to.

providers.title: Multiple Search Providers
providers.description: Choose from multiple search engines and sources to get the most comprehensive results. Switch between providers to find exactly what you're looking for.

inclusive.title: Made for Everyone
inclusive.description: Accessible, inclusive, and designed to work for all users regardless of their background or abilities.

cta.title: Ready to experience better search?
cta.subtitle: Start searching with Tekir today and discover the difference privacy makes.
